alert.note: Alert for Hardee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 6:39PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Hardee County through 715 PM EDT... At 639 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wauchula. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wauchula and Zolfo Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
